"How awful, how terrible! I will not acc:
"Stop acting like a child... Ah, <%me>.
Pay no mind to Katori."
"Dearest <%me>! How can Phantom be so popular with nary an advertisement in sight?!"
"Wait! Don't tell me... Was this affliction forced upon them by an Abyss...!"
"Just ignore her ramblings."
"Everyone is donning strange nicknames as well!"
"It is somewhat strange for a class that makes no efforts to promote itself to reach the same level of recognition as the others."
"Saga and myself have put our hearts and souls and very beings into spreading the good name of Bouncer!"
"But it was all for naught! What do you think of this injustice?"
"Phantom has its charms."
"It's kinda cool."
"Bouncer possesses charm aplenty! How have Phantom's proliferated so profusely without a single ounce of effort!"
"\"Kinda cool\"! Such an ambiguous reason?!"
"It is unfathomable! To think of all the time and effort Stratos put into the Hero class..."
"...Advertising? How foolish."
"Wh-wh-wh-when did you get behind me?!"
"Any fool drawn to Phantom by pretty promises would inevitably drown in their own regret, and fall to ruin..."
"I did not sense you before just now. What fearsome skill..."
"You are the Phantom class representative... I believe Kyokuya was your name."
"It was you! What schemes are you plotting by not advertising in the slightest?!"
"Ah! Could it be... Was it your plan all along to capture the interest of the ARKS by not advertising?!"
"...Foolishness."
"It is not foolish! Class publicity is important!"
"Stratos worked so hard to gain recognition... And that is why Hero has flourished!"
"...And that was utter foolishness."
"Speaking ill of Stratos's hard work is unforgivable!"
"I apologize for Katori's outburst. However, one thing is bothering me."
"What did you mean before, by \"drown in their own regret, and fall to ruin\"?"
"...Precisely as I said. Phantom is wholly uninterested in lip service. Those who lack resolve are unfit."
"If one who is not prepared to abandon justice is persuaded to become a Phantom... They will inevitably fall under the weight of their grief and despair."
"Conversely, those who realize that not all problems can be settled with \"justice\", will naturally find themselves walking the path of Phantom."
"They are the only ones fit to bear its name. That is what I meant..."
"In other words, you only want the best of the best to join. Unlike Hero, where word was spread wide and greatness later achieved."

"...Its reason for existing is different from that of Hero. Phantom exists to accomplish what
\"justice\" cannot..."
"Those who lack the resolve are a hindrance. You may have them if you wish... Farewell."
"Wh-, wh-... What an unbelievable man! The arrogance! The hubris!"
"That man possesses strong resolve... He shows promise, but presents an equal danger... You should be on your guard."
"Ah...! Could it be his overbearing haughtiness is the secret to his popularity?!"
"It has been decided! I must reach the apotheosis of arrogance at once!"
"...Even fewer people will come to us."
